channel.title: germany on The ol' tealeg ruminates
channel.description: Recent content in germany on The ol' tealeg ruminates

item.title: Geoff embraces his new life
item.description: Nic seems to specialise in taking shots of me in compromising positions. Here I am at the local Biergarten (Lochham) , drinking König Lüdwig dunkels bier (my favourite German beer) and supporting Germany in the match against Portugal. For some reason it looks like my ear was bleeding, it wasn’t. Role on Turkey.. probably not one to be in the center of München for given the reaction of the Turkish population here following their victory the following night.

item.title: Guten Morgen 2008
item.description: A new year So… a new year.. the 30th new year of my life. A new location A big year for me. Firstly I am now just two months away from moving to Munich with my girlfriend Nicole and I’m both terrified and excited at the same time. I’m not worried about moving to Germany - strangely I just “know” that this will be OK - I’m worried about the future.

item.title: Auf Deutsch
item.description: A little Danish elefant embraces his future in Germany. I guess everyone knows now that Nic and I are moving to Munich next year.
